name: Momentum Smokejumper 44 Watch
description: With a nod to vintage field watches, this special edition of the popular Atlas watch is light, tough and ready for adventure. Machined from solid titanium the Smokejumper’s 44mm case deceptively lightweight and feels great on the wrist.Light and strong solid titanium case treated with a matte black PVD (physical vapor deposition) super-strong finish.Handsome domed sapphire crystal is virtually scratch proof.Day and date display.12 and 24-hour Arabic numerals.Superluminous indices and hands are easy to read in low light.Rubber wrist band performs well in all environments.Screw-down crown helps seal your watch from the elements.5-year battery life.
